text: ICYMI: As the #vaccine rollout continues in the U.S., is the end of the #COVID19 pandemic in sight? @BakerCHB fellow @PeterHotez joined the #PolicyMatters Podcast to answer this question and to discuss the rise of anti-vaccine sentiment. Listen here: https://t.co/S1AuLMAvQQ https://t.co/cAdMEzArva
